results.name: Number of preferential arrangements of n labeled elements when at least k=7 elements per rank are required.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1/(2 + x - E^x + x^2/2! + x^3/3! + x^4/4! + x^5/5! + x^6/6!),{x,0,40}],x]*Range[0,40]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 02 2014 *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 01 2014
